short_desc: City of Alameda offers summer day and overnight camps for children and families
description: 2013 SUMMER ACTIVITIES: Aquatics, Day Camps, Summer Parks and Playgrounds, Summer Tiny Tots, WOW and Summer Trips, Teens and Tweens and Trailblazers. Call 510-747-7529 or go online to www.alamedaca.gov/recreation/summer for details regarding dates, hours, drop-off and pick up points, sites, registration procedures and fees.
